page.title: 16SUTTON COURT
page.content: This ancient Manor House is over 670 years old and is at present owned by Charles Townley Strachey, the 4th Baron O'Hagan.Unfortunately the old house is in a poor state of repair and is no longer occupied.Lord O'Hagan has plans for its restoration and a certain amount of essential building work has already been carried out.The building is of local stone and the battlemented walls around the Court are considered to be among the oldest walls in England.The Court is surrounded by fine pasture and park land.
